Detailed Description

A point in the plane.

A point in the plane. This is a simple class to demonstrate the basics of classes in C++.

double Point::getA (   )  const
 

What is the angle of this point? If the point happens to be at the origin, we return 0.

Returns:
the angle of this point in [0,2Pi).

void Point::setR (  double  r  ) 
 

Set the radius of this point. The angle of the point is unaffected. If the point happens to be at the origin, then the new location has given radius and angle 0.

Parameters:
r the radius
